events.message: Fix URI link to bitcoin-qt.exe instead of bitcoin.exe

events.body: how did click-on-URI even work, on windows?
I would say it didn't ^^, how should it, the exe could never be found.
In its merged form, it never did.
Seems like a good thing that I'm a Windows guy ;).
